text: Podonidae is a family of onychopods in the order Diplostraca. There are about 8 genera and at least 20 described species in Podonidae. ==Genera== * Caspievadne * Cornigerius * Evadne Lovén, 1836 * Pleopis * Pleopsis Dana, 1853 * Podon Lilljeborg, 1853 * Podonevadne * Pseudevadne Claus, 1877 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Cladocera
title: Podonidae
